title: Vicious Gamers! A Oceania Based Gaming Community!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/y9Whxmp.png
[](http://i.imgur.com/y9Whxmp.png)
What is our Community about?:

We are a Oceania based gaming Community that is only 2 days old. We currently have about 50 active members and we are expanding rapidly. The community is creating a gaming environment for Oceania members!

What can we offer:

• Game Nights.
• A place to meet great new people!
• A casual environment. Play games with friends and people from any skill level.
• A Friendly, harassment-free community for all genders and ethnicity.
• A high-quality Teamspeak 3 Server.
• A variety of channels including; Ranked Teams and Private Channels.
• After we build up a member base of 50-70 active daily members then will have the opportunity to apply for Riot Sanctioned Tournaments.


Come and join us!:
If this sounds like the perfect community for you come and join us on our Teamspeak server linked below.

    Download Teamspeak 3 Client. (@ www.teamspeak.com)
    Connect to ts36.gamespeak.com:9439 and you will be greeted by one of our administrators! 
    Enjoy and have fun!

Server Information:

Teamspeak 3 Server: ts36.gamespeak.com:9439
